title: Avengers assembled
review: The pacing of the movie is great. It shows dispute and how the avengers come together as a team. It's does it's job excellently.

title: This movie was a little disappointing
review: After watching iron man you're pretty much forced to see this movie but it's honestly a bit of a letdown. It's not awful but doesn't feel like an mcu movie.

title: Chill comic people
review:
Ok I don't care that this isn't like the comics because there aren't really any marvel movies exactly like the comics. No one wants to direct a movie that has already been made.
Now that that's out of the way this was a great movie. It showed that without his suits he is still iron man. Tony stark is iron man not his suits. Also this was a great movie in general. I love watching it it Christmas. Best holiday movie ever.

title: Mediocre marvel movies are still great movies
review: This movie was a follow up to iron man. It wasn't the greatest movie ever but it is still a great movie.

title: Not Cap at his best
review: Once again like most faze 1 MCU movies this film does its job and shows us another avenger. All around it's not a bad film but the pacing was a little slow. The movie does show us some cool fights by the end but the trip to the end takes longer then expected. The movie does pay off in the end and is definitely worth a watch. Just nothing outstanding.

title: Oh man they did good
review: Marvel thought hey, let's go to space and do awesome stuff out there. And damn they executed it incredibly! This movie is so worth your watch. It's funny, has ties to the larger marvel movies and has great characters and pacing. Such a good movie.

title: This movie was a little out there
review: When all these movies were coming out it was a little odd to all of a sudden jump to Thor and what not. It wasn't a bad Movie but the storyline was a little boring.

title: I hate the short thing and peaches
review: The whole arc is soooooo cringe worthy. The rest is ok. Should have stopped after the Dino movie.

title: Great start to the mcu
review: This movie gets you hooked on marvel movies and everything else to come.

title: Just watch a summary video
review: This movie is so incredibly awfully boring but was merely a speed bump for the franchise. Like I said, not worth the watch. Marvel tried but failed, just move on to the next movie.
